title: 'Harry Potter' Actors Protest London Dream Home Plans of Ripple Exec
description: Emma Thompson, Imelda Staunton, and Jim Broadbent appear to be seriously aggrieved about their crypto executive neighbor's remodeling plans.

title: Tether Boasts $72.5 Billion US Treasury Exposure as Interest in National Debt Falters
description: Tether, the largest stablecoin in the cryptocurrency market, discussed how its leverage of U.S. treasury bills creates a steady demand for U.S. national debt as a backup of the USDT issuance. The company has exposure to almost $73 billion in U.S. debt, held directly, indirectly, or as collateral for reverse repo operations. Tether U.S. Treasury […]

title: Shaq Oneal faces lawsuit over NFT project
description: Basketball star Shaq Oneal faces a class-action lawsuit for a security laws violation in his Solana NFT project ‘Astrals.’Shaq Oneal allegedly abandoned the project after the FTX collapse, which led to a plummet in the value of the project.
